name: Brainzzz
description:
Brainzzz is a collection of classic and free games with thousands of levels of different difficulties, which include Tangram, OneLine, Sudoku, ColorFill, Maze, Puzzle and other puzzle games. It is a lobby of games that bring players fun and distraction.

Brainzzz invites you to join us:

OneLine

Classic one-line drawing game. This is easy to play but difficult at the same time. In this game you can only draw a painting with your finger.

animal puzzle

Animal theme, with more than 400 different versions of animals, you need to complete a combination of animals according to the outline of the puzzle. Come and challenge.

Flow

Challenging gameplay, using the line to connect two cubes

There are more than 500 levels waiting for you!

Block

Amzing block game, just move the block and fill the map, you can challenge the high targets, come with me!

maze

What you have to do is get out of the terrible maze and reach the goal without hitting the wall.

PipeRoll

You need to rotate the tubes to the right angle and connect the tubes of the same color to find the exit.

ColorFill:

Don't be fooled by the cute eyes. Try to find a solution to fill it up to the entire board.

Sudoku

The smartest people in the world must play sudoku. The sukodu can examine not only the ability to distinguish and organize numbers, but also the capacity for space. It's pretty easy to play. Let's experience the beauty of numbers together.

More fun games will be online soon

Thousands of levels and new gameplay are being designed.

challenge different difficulties

Each game has at least 8 difficulty levels, from beginner level to master level, waiting for your challenge.

Any good ideas and comments are welcome.
